short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to form Xpaths and Css Hassle Free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Element Locator Factory is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline the process of generating and managing web element locators using XPath and CSS selectors. Whether you're a developer, tester, or web enthusiast, Element Factory provides a comprehensive set of tools to enhance your productivity and efficiency.


Key Features:

Generate Locators: Automatically generate XPath and CSS selectors for any web element with a single click.
View Locator Images: Visualize the elements associated with the generated locators to ensure accuracy.
Edit Locators: Easily edit the generated locators to fine-tune them according to your needs.
Delete Locators: Remove unwanted locators with a simple delete option.
Real-time Testing: Test the generated locators in real-time to verify their correctness and functionality.
User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive and easy-to-use interface designed to make your workflow seamless.

Why Choose Element Locator Factory?

Efficiency: Save time by automating the generation of XPath and CSS selectors.
Accuracy: Ensure the accuracy of your locators with visual feedback and real-time testing.
Flexibility: Edit and manage your locators effortlessly to suit your specific requirements.
Productivity: Enhance your productivity with a suite of tools designed to simplify your tasks.
